about.pageSubtitle: DONG TIEN SERVICE AND COMMERCIAL DEVELOPMENT JOINT STOCK COMPANY (DONG TIEN SERVICE AND COMMERCIAL DEVELOPMENT JOINT STOCK COMPANY)

intro.title: About DONG TIEN SERVICE AND COMMERCIAL DEVELOPMENT JOINT STOCK COMPANY
intro.desc: DONG TIEN SERVICE AND COMMERCIAL DEVELOPMENT JOINT STOCK COMPANY (DONG TIEN SERVICE AND COMMERCIAL DEVELOPMENT JOINT STOCK COMPANY) was established on November 23, 2018, specializing in short-term accommodation services (Hotels; Villas or apartments for short-term accommodation; Guesthouses, motels; Inns, shared rooms and similar short-term accommodation). We are committed to providing you with an excellent accommodation experience with comfortable spaces, dedicated service and premium quality.

mission.title: Mission & Core Values
mission.missionDesc: We are committed to providing you with a premium accommodation experience with dedicated service, comfortable spaces and the highest quality. Every customer is treated with respect and care.
values: Dedication: Professional staff, always ready to serve with a dedicated and attentive attitude
Service Quality: Commitment to providing high-quality accommodation services with clean, comfortable and modern spaces
Comfortable Space: Rooms fully equipped with amenities, spacious space creating absolute relaxation
